text: Nottuln is a town in Coesfeld county, 20 km west of Münster, Germany. It consists of * Nottuln * Appelhülsen * Schapdetten * Darup ==History== A church was founded in 860 by Ludger Liudger, as well as the first monastery in Westphalia. After a big fire 1748 it was built up by Johann Conrad Schlaun. The county of Nottuln is at the A43 and a railway. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Coesfeld (district)
title: Nottuln
